pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, January 21, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, January 21, 2016:

Davos-Klosters

The Prime Minister will be in private meetings at the World Economic Forum (WEF) throughout the day.

Davos-Klosters

10:30 a.m. EST/4:30 p.m. CET  The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the following WEF Session: “Global Shapers Meet the Leader, with Prime Minister Justin Trudeau”.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
